i like to play basketball.
I still play the drums to keep my hand-eye coordination and stamina in shape.

participant_2.background:
I remember buying a video game console so I can play with my son.
i grew up in the deep south.
I remember playing in the woods near my house with my siblings.
i am a famous video game character online.
I'm a meataholic with a furry best friend as my ring bearer.

content.text: Hey! It's going great! I just got a new video game console for my son.
That's awesome! What kind of games do you like to play together?
We usually play Mario Kart or Super Smash Bros. I'm really bad at them, but it's a lot of fun.
I used to play those games all the time when I was a kid. They're so much fun!
I know, right? They're great for bonding.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go camping and hiking in the woods. I grew up in the deep south, so I'm used to the outdoors.
That sounds really fun! I've always wanted to go camping, but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely try it! It's a great way to get away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.
I'll have to put it on my list.
